title: Ticket #1839: check ownership of files in condor tarballs
description: There should be a test that confirms that all entries in the tar package are owned by root. In 7.5.5, we had packages where files were owned by the slot user id on the NMI build machine that generated by the package. This is a security concern if the tar is unpacked by root.
